2.4.1 Sikkhasutta
Dutiyapaṇṇāsaka
Iddhipādavagga
Sikkhasutta
83.
479“Pañcimāni, bhikkhave, sikkhādubbalyāni. Katamāni pañca? Pāṇātipāto…pe…  surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānaṃ—  imāni kho, bhikkhave, pañca sikkhādubbalyāni.
480Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṃ sikkhādubbalyānaṃ pahānāya cattāro iddhipādā bhāvetabbā. Katame cattāro? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti, vīriyasamādhi…  cittasamādhi…  vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti. Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṃ sikkhādubbalyānaṃ pahānāya ime cattāro iddhipādā bhāvetabbā”ti.
481Paṭhamaṃ.
